title: Athlete
content:
Athlete Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%.

Your Strength or Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you are Prone, standing up uses significantly less movement. Your Jump distance also increases by 50%.

Athlete is a Feats in Baldur's Gate 3. Feats are special talents or expertises that provide special capabilities to characters. At certain levels,
